name: Dark Old Sun
description: A shoot'em up, with focus on choice and progressiveness, so you can choose between a wide selection of weapons, and upgrade them becoming way more powerfull as you play.Big multi-phase bosses and a dramatic story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP to Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP to Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 250 MB available space
